scripts.build: qspg compile migrations > migrate.sql && mkdir -p build && babel index.js > build/index.js
scripts.reset: npm run build && psql -h localhost -U postgres -c "DROP DATABASE worktree" && node migrate.js
scripts.reset:prod: yn && dotenv cross-var PGPASSWORD=%POSTRES_PASS% psql -h %POSTGRES_HOST% -U %POSTGRES_USER% PROD=TRUE node migrate.js
